<onlyinclude>** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:writable_book_content}}: The contents of this [[book and quill]]. Adding this component to any item other than a {{code|writable_book}} does nothing. If this component is removed from a {{cd|writable_book}} item, attempting to use the item will still swing the arm and increment its {{code|used}} statistic, but no UI will appear.
*** {{nbt|list|pages}}: A list of the pages in the book.
**** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|title}}: The title of this written book. If set to a string, it corresponds to {{nbt|string|raw}}.
***** {{nbt|string|raw}}: The plain text content of the page.
***** {{nbt|string|filtered}}: The filtered text of the page. Optional. Shown only to players with chat filter enabled, instead of {{nbt|string|raw}}.<!--
